verses.roman:
'tāṅhā sarva labhya haya'--prabhura vacana
sei sūtra--ei tāra kaila vivaraṇa

synonyms: tāṅhā—at that place; sarva—everything; labhya—obtainable; haya—is; prabhura—of the Lord; vacana—the word; sei sūtra—that synopsis; ei—this; tāra—His; kaila vivaraṇa—has been described.
translation: Lord Nityānanda said, "In Vṛndāvana all things are possible." Here I have explained His brief statement in detail.
